strings.Value: "Thank you. You can continue your work."
"Thank you, Kimo. Could you make something specific for me?"
"I do not require your services anymore. You can leave now."
"A fighting staff."
"A spear."
"A bow."
"A quiver of arrows."
"A wooden shield."
"I've changed my mind. Just think of something yourself."
"No, Kimo... It was a joke."
"Yes. You have to leave, Kimo."
"Do not despair! I'm glad to see you back. We'll think of something, I promise. But for now, you must go rest."
"Don't make any rash decisions, Kimo. Let's talk about it later."
"Good riddance."
"Remind me, who are you and what are you working on?"
{n}{d|Kimo}Kimo{/d} bows awkwardly, a broad smile dancing on his lips.{/n} "It is ready. I brought you something!"

{n}{d|Kimo}Kimo{/d} can barely contain his excitement.{/n} "Here you go! I'm all done! It's a very fine bow, I must say… Of course, I always try my best when I'm making something for you. But I've never tried as hard as this! And the wood, it's from... errr... a common friend of ours." {n}Kimo winks at you.{/n}
"Specific? Why, of course. With pleasure! But... what exactly?"
"Fine. I will think of something."
{n}The elf gives a leisurely nod.{/n} "I will do it."
"You are welcome!"
{n}Kimo looks at you with wide eyes, looks around the throne room, then stares at you again.{/n} "So... does that mean... Do I have to leave?"
{n}The elf gives a sigh of relief.{/n}

{n}The elf furrows his brow in concentration.{/n} "I do not fully understand the laws of these lands... I just want to say that I am very glad I met you. And I am sad that I have to leave. But, if that is what I must do... Farewell, {name}!"
{n}Kimo coughs in his fist, clearly embarrassed.{/n} "I almost forgot... Please, come and talk to me! I... I have to ask you something. Something personal."
{n}Red as a lobster, Kimo leaves the throne room.{/n}
{n}His face drawn and haggard, {d|Kimo}Kimo{/d} bows to you.{/n}
"Forgive me for not coming for so long. And please accept this humble gift – my final gift to you."
"She has rejected me. She will not listen to my pleas. My work has no sense anymore – just as my life. I shall bid you farewell and leave these lands forever."
{n}Kimo shrugs.{/n} "As you wish…"
"Farewell, {name}. You've helped me on this path – but you couldn't have known where it would lead me." {n}Kimo sighs deeply and leaves the throne room.{/n}

"I'm Kimo, Kimo Tavon! A carpenter, engraver and so on. I can make bows, and spears and staffs too… but my bows are the best! I have something special in mind – a bow that will shoot an arrow's deadly reflection with each shot. I will make it, I know it! If only my inspiration doesn't fail me."
